biocode.fims.rest

Class FimsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • biocode.fims.rest.FimsService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthenticationService, BcidService, ExpeditionService, ProjectService, ResolverService, ResourceService, UserService, Utils, WadlResources

    public abstract class FimsService
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that sets the necessary information when communicating with Biocode-Fims services
